header.description: We offer solutions that make your business better.

services.title: Web Development
services.question: What do you use to build web applications?
services.anwser: We use the latest technologies like React, Next js, MUI, Tailwind and a number of others to write code.

services.title: Web Design
services.question: Where do you create design?
services.anwser: Figma - the software for creating UI x UX design with live stream, so you will be able to see all the process of creating design in live.

services.title: Mobile App Development
services.question: How do you create mobile apps?
services.anwser: Creating a mobile application is quite a complicated thing, but we have all the tools to make it happen. We use live servers like Expo to make sure the app works on all devices . Also React Native makes code that works on Android and IPhone which makes the app much cheaper because you do not have to develop 2 separate apps.

services.title: Data Management
services.question: How can I manage my data?
services.anwser: We provide a custom dashboard that uses your Excel file or our software as a reference and stores your data in a Mongo database. You will be able to analyse and modify your data in a beautiful dashboard it.

services.title: Data Scraping
services.question: What is scraping used for?
services.anwser: Data scraping is used to collect large amounts of data from another website or software. We write spectial bot that can do it for you instead of people that takes a lot of time.
